comments:
I've tried to build eclipse from the eclipse-sourceBuild-srcIncluded-2.0.2.zip
source using ant 1.4.1-4 on a recently installed Debian 3.0 installation. The
build completes with "BUILD SUCCESSFUL", but I am unable to start the
application. I consistently get an "Application not found:
org.eclipse.ui.workbench" in the .log file (see below for the complete contents).

I get the same error after compiling for motif or gtk (2.0.2-5woody1)


!SESSION d??c. 28, 2002 10:08:28.406 --------------------------------------------
